text: Ho (nhung nguoi ban đao cua Nguoi) hoi Nguoi (hoi Thien Su Muhammad) ve ruou va co bac. Nguoi hay tra loi ho: “Trong hai thu vua co toi lon vua co loi ich cho con nguoi nhung toi cua chung lon hon loi ich ma chung mang lai.” Va ho hoi Nguoi “nen bo thi loai tai san nao”. Nguoi hay tra loi ho: “(Cac nguoi hay bo thi) phan tai san con lai (sau khi cac nguoi đa su dung cho nhu cau can thiet).” Nhu the đo Allah đa trinh bay ro cho cac nguoi cac loi mac khai cua Ngai mong rang cac nguoi biet suy ngam
